mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team( team_name, nick_name, foundation, stadium_name, home_place, rival, owner )VALUES( #{teamName}, #{nickName}, #{foundation}, #{stadiumName}, #{homePlace}, #{rival}, #{owner} )
mapper.select: SELECT stadium_name as stadiumName, stadium_location as stadiumLocation FROM stadium

SELECT team_name as teamName, nick_name as nickName, foundation as foundation, stadium_name as stadiumName, home_place as homePlace, rival as rival, owner as owner, active as active FROM team WHERE active = 'T'

SELECT team_name as teamName, nick_name as nickName, foundation as foundation, stadium_name as stadiumName, home_place as homePlace, rival as rival, owner as owner, active as active FROM team WHERE active = 'F'
